main event: An object was first picked up on radar, moving rapidly across the horizon at an estimated speed of 2,000 MPH, while the observer was on patrol.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10 seconds and occurred at an altitude of approximately 2,500 ft.,The object had a saucer-like shape as described by the observer,The observation was made in New Carlisle, Ohio,The observer was stationary and reported that the object passed in front of her view,The source believed the object to be 'out of this world'.
witness description: The observer is a 35-year-old male welder.
